projects.title: TuniMind — Mental Health AI
projects.description: Combines CV emotion recognition with an LLM chatbot to provide empathetic responses and resources. Focused on privacy and on-device inference options.

projects.title: Resume Analyzer (NLP/LLM)
projects.description: An AI tool that parses resumes and extracts skills, experience, and role fit using Hugging Face Transformers. Provides insights and match scoring with a clean Next.js interface.

projects.title: Genius — Multimodal Chatbot
projects.description: A developer-oriented chatbot that supports code, text, and image understanding. Uses LLaMA/Transformers and tool-use patterns with a FastAPI backend and Next.js client.

projects.title: Storage App (Web)
projects.description: A full-stack storage/drive app with auth, file uploads, and sharing. Built with Next.js, Tailwind, Prisma, Supabase; includes role-based access and responsive UI.

projects.title: Blog App (Web)
projects.description: A modern blog platform featuring markdown editing, tags, and search. Uses Next.js + Prisma + Supabase with authentication and a clean editor experience.

projects.title: EN→AR Translator (Fine-Tuned)
projects.description: Fine-tuned a pre-trained translation model on English-to-Arabic datasets to improve accuracy on MENA-specific phrases and named entities. Served via API + minimal UI.

projects.title: Age • Mood • Gender Detection (CV)
projects.description: A computer vision app that estimates age, detects mood, and classifies gender from images. Fine-tuned on curated datasets with robust preprocessing and confidence scores.

projects.title: Titanic Survival Predictor
projects.description: A classic ML pipeline that predicts passenger survival using Scikit-learn with feature engineering and model evaluation. Exposed as a REST API (FastAPI) and a minimal Next.js frontend for inference.
